attributes.action: Give the people FREE medical, dental etc treatment on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it we are taxed to the hilt and yet see nothing but cuts (jobs/beds/hospitals axed) in the NHS? Also if we are paying so much in tax why do we still have to pay for NHS dental treatment and why are there proposals to make people pay for minor surgery? If we are being forced to pay for everything then answer this; WHAT DO TAXES PAY FOR?
